file_insights.changes_summary: Updated skeleton grid layout to be responsive
key_modifications: Changed gridTemplateColumns from fixed 'repeat(4, 1fr)' to responsive breakpoint configuration
Added xs breakpoint: 2 columns for extra-small screens
Added md breakpoint: 4 columns for medium and larger screens

patterns_discovered.context: Using MUI's sx prop with breakpoint object notation for responsive grid columns
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides mobile-friendly skeleton loading UI that adapts to screen sizes

patterns_discovered.context: Loading state visualization using Skeleton components in a responsive grid
patterns_discovered.implementation: Box with display: 'grid' containing multiple Skeleton children mapped from array
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains consistent UX patterns for loading states across different viewport sizes

gotchas_discovered.description: When updating responsive grids, should verify other grid layouts on the same page use consistent breakpoint values
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Review entire ApprovalsPage component to ensure all grids follow same breakpoint strategy

gotchas_discovered.description: The skeleton grid maps 4 items (Array(4)) which displays correctly at md breakpoint (4 columns = 1 row), but at xs breakpoint (2 columns = 2 rows)
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: This is appropriate behavior - skeleton items wrap naturally with responsive columns

approach_outcome.task: Update ApprovalsPage skeleton grids to be responsive
approach_outcome.method: Applied MUI breakpoint-based responsive grid configuration
approach_outcome.result: Single-line modification successfully implements responsive behavior without breaking existing functionality
approach_outcome.efficiency: High - minimal change with maximum impact, leveraging MUI's built-in responsive system

recommendations.recommendation: Audit other skeleton grids on page
recommendations.rationale: Ensure consistency - check if other loading states on ApprovalsPage need similar responsive updates
Verify xs (2-column) and md (4-column) layouts render correctly on actual devices/viewports
Evaluate if sm breakpoint (1-3 columns) would improve UX on tablets
Create component or style guide documenting the xs/md breakpoint pattern for consistency across ApprovalsPage
